resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

string-array.name: carousel_titles_default
string-array.item: Stunting? Stop it! Healthy Children, Bright Future.

string-array.name: carousel_descriptions_default
string-array.item: "smartclass" is an innovative application that helps parents monitor their child\'s growth and provides important information on preventing stunting, with easily accessible health and nutrition tips.
Don\'t let stunting steal your child\'s future. With smartclass, monitor your little one\'s growth and development, ensure their nutrition is sufficient.
Monitor your child\'s health regularly. Ensure balanced nutrition, optimal growth and development, and access to health services. Prevent stunting, create a healthy and smart generation!

string-array.name: onboarding_titles_default
string-array.item: Welcome to the Student Attendance System

string-array.name: onboarding_descriptions_default
string-array.item: Our system helps you monitor and track the attendance of students effectively and efficiently.
Monitor each student\'s attendance and gain insights into their participation in class.
Generate easy-to-read reports to assess overall student attendance and make informed decisions.
